title: DJ Comps Android App
desc:
The need for an organized cloud storage platform for DJ Comps was what
got us started.
We hence decided to create an app solution for the same.
Sharing and downloading resources could not have been made any easier.
We have used Android Studio and a Django Rest Framework for this
project.

## Motivation

* To provide a platform for students and teachers to seamlessly share documents and important notifications
* For a student it’s a one stop portal for sharing all your notes, assignments & study material
* For a teacher it’s a very convenient mode of communicating announcements and validating submission dates.
* Avoids the clutter and confusion of a social messaging site like Whatsapp but at the same time is very fast and intuitive
